query:
-- Update all dive sites with rotating underwater images
UPDATE attraction_guides 
SET heroImage = CASE (id % 8)
  WHEN 0 THEN '/images/attractions/e8ZpYOPqvFRK.jpg'
  WHEN 1 THEN '/images/attractions/0ce5ngGA8fwM.png'
  WHEN 2 THEN '/images/attractions/RXB24pN5u3Jv.jpg'
  WHEN 3 THEN '/images/attractions/LikIAT2Gxrl7.jpg'
  WHEN 4 THEN '/images/attractions/HIVBhGaGxHrb.jpg'
  WHEN 5 THEN '/images/attractions/e8ZpYOPqvFRK.jpg'
  WHEN 6 THEN '/images/attractions/0ce5ngGA8fwM.png'
  ELSE '/images/attractions/RXB24pN5u3Jv.jpg'
END
WHERE attractionType = 'dive_site' AND (heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '');

-- Update all snorkeling spots with tropical reef images
UPDATE attraction_guides 
SET heroImage = CASE (id % 6)
  WHEN 0 THEN '/images/attractions/LikIAT2Gxrl7.jpg'
  WHEN 1 THEN '/images/attractions/HIVBhGaGxHrb.jpg'
  WHEN 2 THEN '/images/attractions/RXB24pN5u3Jv.jpg'
  WHEN 3 THEN '/images/attractions/e8ZpYOPqvFRK.jpg'
  WHEN 4 THEN '/images/attractions/0ce5ngGA8fwM.png'
  ELSE '/images/attractions/LikIAT2Gxrl7.jpg'
END
WHERE attractionType = 'snorkeling_spot' AND (heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '');

-- Update all surf spots with wave/surfing images
UPDATE attraction_guides 
SET heroImage = CASE (id % 5)
  WHEN 0 THEN '/images/attractions/e4Ja70yZ92le.jpg'
  WHEN 1 THEN '/images/attractions/HsvHAshs8wmS.jpg'
  WHEN 2 THEN '/images/attractions/u9mXwCMxC6c1.jpg'
  WHEN 3 THEN '/images/attractions/F7HHwhzJ0h8k.jpg'
  ELSE '/images/attractions/e4Ja70yZ92le.jpg'
END
WHERE attractionType = 'surf_spot' AND (heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '');

-- Update all POIs with generic reef/island images
UPDATE attraction_guides 
SET heroImage = CASE (id % 4)
  WHEN 0 THEN '/images/attractions/HIVBhGaGxHrb.jpg'
  WHEN 1 THEN '/images/attractions/LikIAT2Gxrl7.jpg'
  WHEN 2 THEN '/images/attractions/0ce5ngGA8fwM.png'
  ELSE '/images/attractions/RXB24pN5u3Jv.jpg'
END
WHERE attractionType = 'poi' AND (heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '');
